properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to save the output media.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property.

properties.name: mediaFilesJson
properties.description: A JSON array of media files to append. Each object must have a 'path' and can optionally have an 'overlap' in seconds.

properties.name: jsonFormatNotice
properties.default: Each object in the array must contain a `"path"` key with the full file path. You can optionally include an `"overlap"` key (in seconds) to define the crossfade duration to the *next* clip. The overlap on the final clip is ignored.
